known_issues: Deployment failed during build/deploy process (needs redeploy/investigation).

existing_features.title: Investigate the most recent build/deploy failure and identify the root cause (frontend build, backend canister build, dfx configuration, asset canister, or environment/canister IDs), then apply the minimal code/config changes needed so the project builds successfully end-to-end.
Perform a clean redeploy after applying the fix, ensuring the deployed frontend loads and can communicate with the backend canister (anonymous access at minimum) without runtime errors.

projectName: Investigate deployment failure and redeploy application
